maxPages.title: Maximum number of result pages
maxPages.description: This is the maximum number of result pages you are going to extract. The higher the number, the longer the run will take. If you do not set a maximum number, it could take forever for the actor to finish its run.

simple.title: Extract only basic information
simple.description: Basic information includes property name and location. It does not include the property address and reviews.

useFilters.title: Get more than 1000 results
useFilters.description: Booking.com has a limit of 1,000 results. Select to overcome this limit, but keep in mind the run will take much longer.

startUrls.title: Insert Booking.com URL
startUrls.description: These are the Booking.com URLs you can scrape instead of the search term. It is better to use a simple URL and filter other options in filters here.
startUrls.sectionCaption: Use a Booking.com URL instead of the search term

sortBy.title: Order results by
sortBy.description: Hotel attribute by which the results will be ordered

minScore.title: Minimum rating
minScore.description: Minimum rating of a hotel in "8.4" format

currency.title: Preferred currency
currency.description: Currency to be set on the website

language.title: Language
language.description: Language to be set on the website (does not apply to reviews)

checkIn.title: Check-in date (yyyy-mm-dd)
checkIn.sectionCaption: Set availability details if you want to get information about rooms

minMaxPrice.title: Price range
minMaxPrice.description: Insert the minimum and maximum price per night, e.g. 100-150.

maxReviews.title: Maximum reviews
maxReviews.description: Number of reviews to be scraped for each detail page. You can scrape up to 10 reviews without using any extra credits.

scrapeReviewerName.title: Include reviewer name
scrapeReviewerName.description: Extract reviewer name only if you have a legitimate reason to do so.

proxyConfig.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfig.description: Select the proxies you want to use (automatic Apify proxies/Residentials/your own).

testProxy.title: Test proxies (useful for proxy groups with many blocked IPs, experimental)
testProxy.description: Before the run, the crawler will try to find a proxy that's not blocked by Booking.com

extendOutputFunction.title: Extend output function
extendOutputFunction.description: Function that takes a JQuery handle ($) as argument and returns data that will be merged with the default output

debug.title: Debugging mode
debug.description: Select if you want to display debug logs.
